title: My DIY drip-line IRRIGATION setup EXPLAINED while welding a BROADFORK!

tasks.task: Setting up a drip line irrigation system for a garden
subtasks: Replacing a tine on a broad fork
Welding a filter holder
Installing a drip line filter
Connecting drip lines to water mains
Splitting the garden into blocks controlled by ball valves
Removing current watering can system
Organizing garden beds for drip irrigation
Planting new crops in prepared beds
Monitoring garden progress and harvesting
Purchasing drip line materials and components
Calculating cost savings from irrigation efficiency
Sourcing water tanks and storage facilities
Installing water filtration system
Maintaining and troubleshooting irrigation system

tasks.task: Setting Up Drip Irrigation System for the Garden
subtasks: ** Replace a broad fork tine.
** Weld a filter holder.
** Install a drip line filter.
** Connect drip lines to water mains.
** Split the garden into blocks controlled by ball valves.
** Remove the old watering can system.
** Organize garden beds for drip irrigation.
** Plant new crops (e.g., sunflowers, corn, beans).
** Harvest and manage existing crops (e.g., onions, spinach).
** Calculate time savings from using a drip irrigation system.
** Source necessary components for irrigation (e.g., drip lines, filter, water tanks).
** Fix issues with pipa keys not fitting through drill holes.

tasks.task: 為農機工具進行保養及改良**
subtasks: ** 更換宽叉的齒片
** 焊接过滤器支架
** 安裝滴灌过滤器
** 將滴灌管與供水主管道連接
** 將滴灌管分區域控制閥門（如球閥）
** 移除舊的澆水桶系統
** 多數菜園認為基於滴灌需求重新組織農地
** 移植新作物（如向日葵、玉米、豆類）
** 收獲和管理現有作物（如大蔥、菠菜）
** 確定并解決水閥安裝問題

tasks.task: Replace a Tine on a Broad Fork**

subtasks: ** Replace a worn tine on the broad fork.
** Assemble and install a disk filter to prevent clogging.
** Connect the filter to the water mains.
** Install drip lines in the garden, ensuring they run along the intended rows.
** Split the garden into manageable blocks using ball valves for segmented irrigation.
** Remove the old watering can system and replace it with the new drip lines.
** Plant new crops like sunflowers, corn, and beans in the prepared beds.
** Continuously tend to existing crops, monitoring for harvest opportunities and rotation.
** Calculate the financial savings and time efficiency gains from the new irrigation system.
** Source necessary components for future maintenance and expansion.
** Fix a thin tine on a broad fork to prevent further damage and improve usage.
** Weld and mount the filter disk for drip line irrigation.
** Connect the assembled filter to the existing water supply lines.
** Run drip lines through the garden beds and split the garden into sections controlled by ball valves.

** Acquire necessary materials and plan for future maintenance.

tasks.task: Prepare the Garden for New Irrigation

subtasks: ** Đổi răng vụt mỏng trên cào phẳng để đảm bảo hiệu quả sử dụng.
** Cung cấp và gắn chắc chắn bộ lọc (dùng hàn để cài đặt bộ lọc).
** Kết nối bộ lọc vào đường ống cấp nước chính.
** Cuộn đặt ống nhỏ giọt quaCrop beds và phân chia khu vực vườn bằng valvets.
** xoá hệ thống tưới phun mưa cũ thay bằng hệ thống nhỏ giọt mới.
** Trồng các loại cây phù hợp với hệ thống tưới nhỏ giọt.
** Thu hoạch các cây trồng hiện có để tạo không gian cho cây mới.
** Tính toán lợi nhuận từ hệ thống mới.
** Dự kiến và mua các bộ phận phụ tùng cần thiết cho tương lai.
